level.heading: Qualifications of directors.
level.text: The articles of incorporation or bylaws may prescribe qualifications for directors. A director need not be a resident of the District or a shareholder of the corporation unless the articles of incorporation or bylaws so prescribe.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
